title: How to Grow Great Potatoes at Your Place

tasks.task: Territorial Explanatory Video Viewing and Learning
subtasks: Listen to Bev Buckley introduce herself
Understand Bev's background in organic vegetable and fruit farming
Note duration of Bev's farming experience (14 or 15 years)
Recognize Bev's teaching activities, including teaching hundreds of people on-site and conducting internet courses
Identify the key issue discussed: people's fear of taking up new challenges in gardening due to lack of parental/generational knowledge
Understand Bev's recommendation for Annette's book on growing potatoes
Identify the benefits of the book mentioned by Bev (when to plant, fertilizers, pest management)
Note Bev's encouragement to read the book for growing confidence in potato cultivation
